channel.title: Easy rsc questions and kronik online question
channel.description:
for easy rsc, no one can connect (aka get on my server) i have just ran a rs2 server and had 20 people on it, why cant people get on my easy rsc server? i know i have portforwared right
Kronik Online ok since this one has a www, do i need to portforward port 80? how do people get on the www?
kk thanks lol k

item.title: Easy rsc questions and kronik online question
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

[quote=“lol k, post:1, topic:291942”]for easy rsc, no one can connect (aka get on my server) i have just ran a rs2 server and had 20 people on it,
why cant people get on my easy rsc server? i know i have portforwared right

Kronik Online
ok since this one has a www, do i need to portforward port 80? how do people get on the www?

kk thanks
lol k[/quote]
You need to portforward these ports;
8181
43594
34522
I think that’s it. Then you need to have Wamp, set it up, copy the WWW folder into your C:/ drive in Wamp/www and then keep it always open. Download rscd.sql (sorry i didn’t include it in the server includes) and create a database called “rscd” then import rscd.sql when your in that database, and then secure the database with a password and the WWW and Server with a password. Then you have to get people to register up Twice in the forums (first is for forum account use, second is for server account).

Read full topic
item.source: Easy rsc questions and kronik online question
